insert into order_outer (trd_side, order_type, order_status, order_ID, order_IDEx, code, `name`, qty, price, create_date, update_date, fill_qty, fill_avg_price, last_err_msg, sec_market) values (#{trdSide,jdbcType=BIT}, #{orderType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderIdex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qty,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fillQty,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{fillAvgPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{lastErrMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{secMarket,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update order_outer set trd_side = #{trdSide,jdbcType=BIT}, order_type = #{orderType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, order_IDEx = #{orderIdex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qty = #{qty,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, fill_qty = #{fillQty,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, fill_avg_price = #{fillAvgPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, last_err_msg = #{lastErrMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sec_market = #{secMarket,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, trd_side, order_type, order_status, order_ID, order_IDEx, code, `name`, qty, price, create_date, update_date, fill_qty, fill_avg_price, last_err_msg, sec_market from order_outer where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
